doc.para: for this refer to the column in which individual unit ids are given
This field is used to record an identifier attributed to the documented entity.
This field is used to record the type of the identifier attributed to the documented entity.
geometry of the unit - choose from the list
This field is used to record the formal type of the documented entity.
refer to the column in which you identify individual persons involved in the investigation of the unit.
This field is used to document a person taking part in the surveying of a survey unit under any capacity.
specify the role of this person
This field is used to document the role a person played in the surveying of a survey unit.
refer to the column in which you indicate the time(span) of the investigation
This field is used to record the specific timespan during which the survey unit was surveyed.

refer here to an overall estimate or measurement of visibility of archeological remains on the ground surface . This is usually composed from several factors such as vegetation cover, tillage, weathering etc. preferred unit is %
This field is used to record the value for the documented instance of dimension.
indicate which kind of scale was used to measure or estimate vsibility. If this was an estimate in words (eg, good, medium, ...) first transform to a numeric scale.
This field is used to record the formal type of the documented dimension.
if the measurement is in textual form first convert to either a number or percentage
This field is used to record the unit for the documented instance of dimension.

refer here to an overall estimate or measurement of the proportion of the total ground surface of the unit that has been observed (as a %). This is usually based on the interval between walkers and the estimated width of the swath being observed by each walker.
This field is used to record the value for the documented instance of dimension.
This field is used to record the formal type of the documented dimension.
This field is used to record the unit for the documented instance of dimension.
Is this intended to direct to eg a shapefile?
This field is used to record coordinate data which defines the geospatial location of the documented place.
refer to the column which indicates the site to which this unit belongs
This field is used to link the documented survey surface unit to an instance of an archaeological site it is a part of.
This field is used to link a specific surface survey unit to an instance of a surface unit forming a part it.
IS This intended to direct to eg toponym, municiplaity, ...?
This field is used to record the broader place to which the documented place belongs as part.
refer to the column that links the survey unit to individual artefact collections (also called samples) from that unit
This field is used to document a sample collected from survey surface unit.
indicate which collection protocols were used - choose from the list
This field is used to document the type of sample collected from survey surface unit.
is this intended for eg sample weight, count?
This field is used to document the dimensions of a sample collected from survey surface unit.
refer to columns that present information on different kinds of objects that were not collected but observed to be present (eg, building materials, ...)
This field is used to document a different entity types observed during surveying.
indicate how the observed types have been quantified (choose from the list
This field is used to document the value of different entity types observed during surveying.
refer to the column where you have entered textual descriptive information regarding the unit
This field is used to record the actual textual content of the statement describing the documented entity.
This field is used to record the coordinates system used to define the documented place.
This field is used to record the specific coordinates used to define the documented place.
This field is used to record the type of coordinates used to define the documented place.
This field is used to record a generic statement about the geometric expression used to define the documented place.
is this intended to direct to a shapefile?
This field is used to link the documented entity to a digital object, expressed as a uri, which describes it.
refer to the column in which you identify the administrator
This field is used to document the person who recorded the surveying activities as a part of the survey process unit.
